# WebGL Shader Playground

## Overview

This project is interactive editor for creating, running and testing WebGLv2 (GLSL) shaders.

It's basically [Shadertoy](https://www.shadertoy.com/) but much simplier and created by me!

![screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/14982936/396926533-3082a985-0692-47a8-b0b5-070486169801.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..ol5u5S4y-22YwakCLjmYA1Qn-HSct5Ww4xkGJfXOxYY)

## Try it out

[gpu.benco.io](https://gpu.benco.io)
